TopicTitle: Kethane Prospecting Grid in position. No Jeb', don't touch that !

Articles.Content:
Hi everyone !

I've been playing KSP since a while, but now that i'm on vacation, i'm full in my Space Program, alongside a ton of greats mods that made my launch loading worth its 15min !

My first large scale project was to launch a Probe Cluster to prospect for Kethane around Minmus, and it was a full succes. I'm now looking for extraction and exploitation of this precious gaz. Here i come, moons of Kerbin !

Anyway, great game so far, i hope it will become more and more good with the time, with all the things that i know are planned, adding with that a great community of modders that !

Mag' out !
